title: Form

description.content: Forms are used for creating content of sub-items or for configuring objects or services.
A form is divided into areas which are further divided into sections containing settings with selection or input controls.
Users manipulate input in settings and save the form to apply the settings to the object or service.

context: Forms are usually placed in a tabbed content area.
rules: Each form MUST contain at least one titled form section.
Forms MUST NOT be used on the same content screen as tables.
Forms MUST NOT be used on the same content screen as toolbars.
